DataElement.preferredName: Observation Reuse Template Study Activity Method Code ISO21090.CD.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A coded value specifying the technique that is used for the observation. EXAMPLE(S): (1) Arterial puncture, sphygmomanometry (for blood pressure measurement), (2) Global introspection, algorithm, bayesian (for Adverse Event causality), (3) Estrogen Receptor Assay, Progesterone Receptor Assay, p53 Assay (for clinical result assay).

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Observation Reuse Template Study Activity Method Code
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Watching something and taking note of what happens.:To use again.:Something that establishes or serves as a pattern for reference; a form, mold, or pattern used as a guide to making something.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective._A means, manner of procedure, or systematic course of actions that have to be performed in order to accomplish a particular goal.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.
